entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023
